paragraphs.1: Budget appropriations totalling 3,461,385,200 United States dollars, consisting of 3,450,426,300 dollars approved for 2026 by the General Assembly in paragraph 1 of resolution A above, and 10,958,900 in additional appropriations for 2025, as approved by the Assembly in its resolution 79/258 B of 11 April 2025, shall be financed in accordance with regulations 3.1 and 3.2 of the Financial Regulations and Rules of the United Nations1 and paragraph 3 of resolution 80/
paragraphs.2: In addition, there shall be added an amount totalling 53,000,000 dollars, relating to a commitment authority in the amount of 53,000,000 dollars to support the funding of the resident coordinator system approved by the General Assembly in section I of its resolution 80/
paragraphs.3: Furthermore, in accordance with paragraph 3 of resolution 80/
paragraphs.4: There shall be set off against the assessment on Member States, in accordance with the provisions of General Assembly resolution 973 (X) of 15 December 1955, their respective share in the Tax Equalization Fund totalling 278,735,200 dollars relating to the appropriations for 2026 and 805,700 dollars relating to the additional appropriations for 2025.
